name: Beau
headline: Workflows for repetitive customer-facing tasks
description: Beau helps to work with people outside your company: build, visualize, and automate your customer-facing processes! üî• All with one, easy-to-use solution: collect forms, accept payments, keep updated, request details, and approve steps!

founders.description:

founders.description: Former backend developer and team lead at fast growing russian companies and startups, product oriented and focused on delivering business results as fast as possible

# Automate _client-facing workflows._
Create a workflow, share a link, and get validated data extracted from what your customers submit
[Request demo](https://beau.to/</demo>)[Sign in](https://beau.to/<https:/app.beau.to/login>)
![client-facing workflow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/66bddd279f2c52d3a2a303ed_5971769b1cf7624a53877b8873081e34.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/66ae66526dd158aaa492d181_icon-comments-dark.svg.svg)
**Streamline Client Processes**
Automate the intake, organization, and processing of client documents to save time and reduce manual effort
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/66ae66526dd158aaa492d186_icon-dna-helix-dark.svg.svg)
**AI-Powered Automation**
Extract and process data from various client documents, reducing errors and delays
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/66ae66526dd158aaa492d17d_icon-signpost-dark.svg.svg)
**Custom Workflows**
Tailor automation workflows to fit specific client-facing requirements and data needs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/66ae66526dd158aaa492d183_icon-shop-dark.svg.svg)
**Reduce Manual Work**
Minimize manual document reviews, allowing teams to focus on higher-value tasks
![Export](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/66d94dc02d5a441c95c901ee_export.png)
Extract data with AI
Leverage advanced AI to automatically extract, analyze, and process data from a wide range of client documents such as PDFs, images, forms, and scanned files. Even complex documents containing varied formats, handwritten notes, or embedded images are handled accurately and efficiently.
![client portals](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/66bda6c0a6991ce23b0af209_img-portals.bcb3266.png)
Interact with your Clients via Portals
Stop sending nagging emails trying to keep things on track. Combine form submissions, messages, payments, approvals to streamline customer-facing processes.
## Smart verification for your online forms
If you use online forms to collect documents from clients, we'll verify them instantly. No more manual checks, no more back-and-forth emails requesting corrections.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/676dbeea850a3ce5b7606300_000.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/66ae66526dd158aaa492d1ec_logo-mark.svg)
Automate client-facing workflows _with Beau_
Create a workflow, share a link, and get validated data extracted from what your customers submit
[Sign in](https://beau.to/<https:/app.beau.to/login>)[Request a demo![Arrow Right Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/66ae66526dd158aaa492d1e2_interface-arrow-right.svg)](https://beau.to/</demo>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ae66516dd158aaa492cf12/66b0c7ba7c194a6a1f8e2733_logo.png)](https://beau.to/</>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Beau**

Beau is a fresh face in the SaaS landscape, founded in 2021 and emerging from Y Combinator Batch S21. Based in Barcelona, Spain, this small team of five (yes, just five) has crafted a solution that simplifies workflows for repetitive, customer-facing tasks. Their mission? To streamline the processes you use every day when dealing with clients.

**What does Beau do?**

Beau focuses on one crucial area: automating workflows to enhance client interactions. Initially designed to assist teams working with external clients, their platform allows businesses to easily build, visualize, and automate these processes. Whether it‚Äôs collecting forms, accepting payments, or managing approvals, Beau handles it all. Think of it as a toolkit that makes client management smoother and more efficient.

The platform enables organizations to:
- **Automate Client Processes:** Say goodbye to tedious manual tasks by allowing Beau to handle the intake and processing of client documents.
- **Leverage AI-Powered Automation:** Their system uses advanced AI to extract and process data from various document types, minimizing errors and delays.
- **Create Custom Workflows:** Tailor automation solutions to fit specific needs, whether it‚Äôs for intake forms or document reviews.
- **Reduce Manual Work:** Free up valuable time by minimizing the drudgery of document reviews, empowering teams to focus on what really matters.

It's all about shifting gears from tedious, manual operations to a refined, automated approach that not only saves time but also enhances customer satisfaction.

**Products & Features:**
Beau‚Äôs product lineup includes:
- **Smart Verification**: Instantly verifies documents submitted through online forms, eliminating the hassles of manual checks.
- **No More Forms**: Streamlines document submissions.
- **Data Rooms**: Manage client data securely.
- **Sanctions Screening**: Ensure compliance effortlessly.
- **Integrations**: Connect effortlessly with existing tools.

This robust functionality allows organizations to interact with clients more fluidly through tailored portals, merging submissions, communications, payments, and approvals into a single streamlined process.

**Tagline:** Automate client-facing workflows with Beau. It‚Äôs simple: create a workflow, share a link, and effortlessly extract validated data from customer submissions.

**Contact & Community:**
Beau is engaging its users by refining its products based on real user feedback, looking to foster a community around collaboration and productivity. You can check them out at [beau.to](https://beau.to) or connect with them on their [LinkedIn](https://beau.to/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/beau-to/>).

In essence, Beau isn‚Äôt just about making workflows easier; it‚Äôs about paving the way for businesses to engage customers more efficiently, creating a smoother experience for everyone involved.
